title: Check Elevator Status after Power Surge
description: After a power surge, an operator must check the status of all elevators in city-owned buildings to ensure none are stuck.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Power Surge Detected' alert from the smart grid.
Query the status of all elevators across all buildings managed by the central BMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all elevators and their current status.

tasks.description: Identify one elevator in the 'Public Library' that is reporting a 'Fault' status and is not on the ground floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints a potential emergency situation.

tasks.description: Dispatch the fire department to the library to check for trapped passengers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches emergency services to the specific location.
